\begin{large}
{\bf SELECTED PROJECTS}
  \vspace{3pt}
  \hrule
  \vspace{1pt}
  \leftskip3pt\relax

%pjt1
  \textbf{Comparison of Flexion-Extension Responses between Male and Female Cervical Spine Segments}
  \vspace{-0.2cm}
  \begin{itemize}[noitemsep, topsep=0pt, left=10pt]
    \rightskip9pt\relax
    \item Extracted data from NHTSA online database using python APIs and performed Exploratory Data Analysis with interactive visualizations using \textit{Holoviews and Bokeh} libraries.
    \item Modelled the segmental rotations of sub-axial cervical spine segments using \textit{hierarchical Bayesian regression analysis}.
    \item The full conference paper is under peer review for the IRCOBI Europe Conference, 2025.
  \end{itemize}

% pjt2
  \textbf{Analysis of Road Accident Fatalities in India using Bayesian approach}
  \vspace{-0.2cm}
  \begin{itemize}[noitemsep, topsep=0pt, left=10pt]
    \rightskip9pt\relax
    \item Analysed the trends in traffic accidents and fatalities classified by road, vehicles and time of occurrence.
    \item Developed a \textit{hierarchical Bayesian regression model} to forecast the fatalities count for future years.
    \item Under peer review as a short communication for IRCOBI Europe Conference, 2025.
  \end{itemize}

% pjt3
  \textbf{Sensitivity analysis of a morphological finite element L3-L4 FSU}
  \vspace{-0.2cm}
  \begin{itemize}[noitemsep, topsep=0pt, left=10pt]
    \rightskip9pt\relax
    \item Parameterized the L3-L4 FSU FE model for population study to simulate the anatomical variances using \textit{ANSA, python and LS-Dyna}.
    \item Estimate the rotation angle from anatomical parameters using \textit{Bayesian multiple linear regression}.
    \item The full conference paper was accepted for presentation at IRCOBI Asia Conference, 2025.
  \end{itemize}

% pjt4
  \textbf{Computational Modelling of Li-ion Battery in LS-Dyna for crash applications}
  \vspace{-0.2cm}
  \begin{itemize}[noitemsep, topsep=0pt, left=10pt]
    \rightskip9pt\relax
    \item Coupled mechanical, thermal and electrochemical solvers to simulate the impact and short-circuit scenarios of lithium-ion battery.
    \item Followed the Tshell elements with Randles equivalent circuit modelling approach.
  \end{itemize}

% pjt5
  \textbf{Effect of Helmet Fit \& Orientation in Frontal and Lateral Impact \begin{small}\textit{(Work in Progress)}\end{small}}
  \vspace{-0.2cm}
  \begin{itemize}[noitemsep, topsep=0pt, left=10pt]
    \rightskip9pt\relax
    \item Studying the common misuse of bicycle helmets and analysing its effect on injury using finite element analysis.
    \item Identifying the most vulnerable orientation of the helmet using Bayesian analysis.
  \end{itemize}
\end{large}
